name: Woda, the Web Oriented Database

screenshots.caption: Main menu of the Open Archive demo database.
Advanced search illustrating also fields sorting & selection

short_description: WODA is a Perl program that manages web-oriented, semi-relational, multimedia databases. It allows them to be defined, maintained, added-to, modified, and queried entirely through the WWW, httpd and Web Services interfaces and without (much) programming.
summary: Mature SGBD in Perl with a web interface
